caption.p: The mean response of species assemblages ( SARs) at each site for each IHA metric and river order in the Treene (67 sites, a–j) and Kinzig (223 sites, k–t) catchments for horizon 2050 (upper row in each catchment, a–e and k–o) and horizon 2090 (lower row in each catchment, f–j and p–t). The characters (a, b, c, and ab) show whether the values of species assemblage responses in a river order would be significantly ( p < .05; dissimilar characters) different from other river orders or not (similar characters)
